title: Legally Blonde
short_plot_summary: Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority queen, follows her ex-boyfriend to Harvard Law School to win him back, ultimately discovering her love for law and a newfound sense of self.
explanation: Elle Woods, the main character and sorority queen
A broken heart, representing Elle's initial motivation to attend law school due to her breakup with her boyfriend
A stack of books, symbolizing Elle's studies and growth at Harvard Law School
A balance scale, representing the legal profession and Elle's newfound passion for law
A dog, in honor of Elle's beloved pet, Bruiser
